column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I have a hard time rating Lou Malnati's because the food is awesome
column2: but the service is always bad.  Whenever we make a trip to Chicago
column3: we make a trip to Lou Malnati's
column4: because it is some of the best pizza you will ever have.  The pizza is always perfectly cooked and is cheesy and delicious.  But again
column5: with the service...The last time we were there
column6: I asked about an IPA on tap and the server had no idea what beers they had.  He took our drink order and it took a good 20 minutes for him to come back and get our food order.  Overall
column9: the food is awesome.  Highly recommended
column10: but don't go if you are on a time schedule.
